description: KL Rahul says the lessons he learnt from the likes of Virat Kohli and AB de Villiers while playing for IPL team Royal Challengers Bangalore have made him a better cricketer and he would look to "express" himself in the Zimbabwe tour beginning Saturday.
title: Kohli, De Villiers helped in improving my cricket: Rahul

description: As India's hunt for cricket's new chief coach gathers momentum, Mahendra singh Dhoni, who has worked with quite a number of coaches during his decade-long career, on Tuesday said the candidate must understand the country's culture.
title: Coach should understand our culture: Dhoni

description: Indian limited-overs skipper Mahendra Singh Dhoni side-stepped the intense speculation on his future as captain of the side by saying that it is for the BCCI to take a call on the matter.
title: Decision on my future as captain will be taken by BCCI: Dhoni

description: Medium pacer Tinashe Panyangara has been ruled out of the upcoming ODI series and three T20 internationals against India with a back injury, while Graeme Cremer returned to lead the side in both forms of the game.
title: Injured Panyangara out of India series

description: Zimbabwe have axed their coach Dav Whatmore and captain Hamilton Masakadza just days before the arrival of India for a five-match limited-overs tour.
title: Zimbabwe axe coach and captain ahead of India series

description: Former captain Rahul Dravid made it clear that any decision on taking up coach's role with the senior Indian team will depend on whether he has the time and "bandwidth" for the high-profile job.
title: Coaching India depends on whether I have that capacity: Dravid

description: England allrounder Ben Stokes, who was hit for four successive sixes by Carlos Brathwaite during Sunday's ICC World Twenty20 final at Eden Gardens, has spoken about how he felt as if "the whole world had come down" on him.
title: Ben Stokes reveals 'complete devastation' after World T20 loss

description: After losing their tournament-opener, India gallantly fought back to reach the last four stage but they needed a collective team effort to go all the way.
title: World T20 team review: Favourites India outdone by no-balls and Simmons

description: Viv Richards has come out in support of Darren Sammy after West Indies Twenty20 skipper criticised the Cricket Board (WICB) for its lack of support during their triumphant campaign.
title: Richards backs Sammy in dispute with WICB after World T20 win

description: TOI picks the top moments that enthralled the viewers during the 2016 ICC World T20
title: Top moments of World T20

description: New Zealand destroyed all their opponents in the league stage but a slight distraction while batting against England in the semi-final cost them the match.
title: World T20 team review: One bad game ends New Zealand's title bid

description: West Indies captain Darren Sammy's post-match comments were no way less explosive than the sixes hit by Carlos Brathwaite.
title: World T20: Winning was the only way we could make a statement, says Sammy

description: T20 format remains the Achilles' heel for the otherwise dominant Australian team as they failed to solve the puzzle and faded out in the group stage.
title: World T20 team review: Australia fail to crack the code again

description: Despite being the most unpredictable team, Pakistan have a decent record in the World T20 but this time they were unable to cope up with the distractions.
title: World T20 team review: Pakistan came with controversy, left with another

description: In an increasingly perfection-seeking sport, the West Indies, for all their problems, have brought joy to millions with their untamed, spontaneous brand of cricket...
title: World T20: The Phoenix has risen again

description: The legendary Curtly Ambrose, who never won a World Cup as a player, spoke to TOI on what this win meant, the influence skipper Darren Sammy and a lot more.
title: Adversities united us as a team: Curtly Ambrose

description: A world title would have been their crowning glory but England showed they are moving in the right direction.
title: England's limited-overs resurgence continues

description: No matter how well the spinners bowled in the 2016 ICC World T20, international captains showed a singular lack of faith in tweakers when it came to bowling at the death in general and the last over in particular.
title: World T20: Captains ignore spinners at the death

description: Pakistan's head coach Waqar Younis resigned on Monday weeks after his team's humiliating exit from the World Twenty20 tournament at the group stage.
title: Waqar Younis resigns as Pakistan coach

description: TOI picks the best playing XI of the the recently concluded World T20 held in India.
title: World T20: Team of the tournament
